page.title: 09SPORT
page.content: Sawbridgeworth Cricket Club is situated next to the doctors' car park.The club green has six wickets and two cricket nets.The cricket club has a new clubhouse and the pavilion stands opposite.At the bottom of the green is the tennis club.The club has four concrete courts and two grass courts.The Bowls club is opposite the tennis club.It has a good green and a reasonable clubhouse which replaced the old one.Sawbridgeworth Football club is at the end of the Crofters estate.The clubhouse has a bar,toilets and dressing rooms.The swimming pool is situated next to Leventhorpe school.There are lessons taught most days of the week.There are other facilities for snooker and table tennis.
